name: Emerson Electric Co.
membership: EMERSON IS A MAJOR GLOBAL MANUFACTURING COMPANY AND IS THEREFORE A MEMBER OF MULTIPLE ORGANIZATIONS AROUND THE WORLD, SUCH AS ORGALIME, CEMEP AND GAMBICA IN EUROPE.
goal: Emerson is a global manufacturing company serving the needs of companies in the industries of process management, industrial automation, climate technologies and commercial and residential solutions.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Climate policy, emissions, energy policy, substances, energy efficiency, materials and resource efficiency.
